DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess continuation rate patient satisfaction self administration subcutaneous depot medroxyprogesterone acetate .
DOC.brief_title: Self Administration Subcutaneous Depot Medroxyprogesterone Acetate
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study include new current Depo Provera user express interest attempt subcutaneous self administration depot medroxyprogesterone acetate . Candidates teach self administration clinic assistant Planned Parenthood Southwest Central Florida . Patients able correctly self administer medication wish attempt continue home self administration , provide supply educational material . Continuation rate satisfaction method assess use preaddressed survey patient return information .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old Can understand write spoken English Current past user DMPA desire initiation DMPA contraception Provider approve DMPA use woman Willing consider/attempt DMPA selfinjection . Willing receive phone calls/letter follow Willing return letter follow Has contraindication DMPA use : Vaginal bleed unknown etiology Medication use Cushing 's syndrome Currently pregnant Blood pressure > 160/100 Intolerance idea irregular absent menses
